entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wet snow over higher terrain this morning. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to near valley bottom after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
